Sentencas: Data-driven fault diagnosis is a promising approach for the early detection and isolation of malfunctions in power generation plants deploying solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis in SOFC-based power plants under off-design operating conditions

Sentencas: Despite the supervised classifier used in a data-driven system is trained by samples gathered under one specific design-point operating condition, during real operation the plant can move to a new, unexpected off-design operating condition, reducing the performance of the diagnosis system.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis in SOFC-based power plants under off-design operating conditions

Sentencas: This Short Communication demonstrates that this reduction is heavily mitigated if the supervised classifier is adapted to the new condition through the domain adaptation statistical technique.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis in SOFC-based power plants under off-design operating conditions

Sentencas: The present study shows that a probability of correct classification between 85% and 94% can be achieved in off-design, when a probability of 95% is obtained at the design-point.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis in SOFC-based power plants under off-design operating conditions
